author: PFCal-dev
body:
Adding @dnoonan08 

#### PR description:
This PR implements an additional data compression algorithm, an auto-encoder, for the frontend ECON-T.
It is not enabled by default, and the default behaviour of the HGCAL TPG is not affected.

Details on this auto-encoder can be found in this presentation :
https://indico.cern.ch/event/987946/contributions/4174157/
(the slides include links to older presentations as well)

Depends on external cms-data/L1Trigger-L1THGCal#21

#### PR validation:

Tested workflows
```
runTheMatrix.py -w upgrade -l 23234.0 --maxSteps=2                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
runTheMatrix.py -w upgrade -l 28234.0 --maxSteps=2                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
runTheMatrix.py -w upgrade -l 31434.0 --maxSteps=2
```
title: [HGCAL trigger] Auto-encoder for ECON-T data compression
